name: paganism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a religion that worships many gods, especially a religion that existed before the main world religions: Nature beliefs were common in every variety of ancient paganism.
(also neo-paganism) a modern religion that includes beliefs and activities that are not from any of the main religions of the world, for example the worship of nature: He was attracted to paganism - especially Wicca - because of its philosophy. She believes that Christian churches can learn from paganism's emphasis on the Earth. See
pagan
More examplesFewer examplesThe family practices paganism.Paganism is growing because it stresses connections to the Earth.Yule has its roots in both Christianity and paganism. Paganism broadly applies to many people who practice an earth-based belief system.
